# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $100. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this high-value item at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
